Okay, so I was having problems with this install but seems to work for me now & I created an account just so I could comment on how I got it to work (Win 7 pro). 
First, the setup wanted to install the program file under "C: GamesTomb Raider" by default, which I thought was odd, so instead I installed it into: C:Program Files (x86)DeepSilver , as that was where the previous Dead Island game was located. Then I disabled my firewall (enabled "game mode") as that seemed to prevent the game from loading up. At the menu screen I set it to "single player only" as suggested, but I was still getting a message that said "data could not be saved". I then just tried to run it with administrator access and the game runs smoothly now. Selected my character, played for a few min to test it out, 0 crashes.
Well, great I was wrong. Game played fine for about 10 minutes, then I quit to log in here to comment & now it crashes.
As far as I can tell- the crashing after the opening cutscenes lies with the  "steam_api.dll"  . Perhaps someone would upload a working crack soon.
I'm glad I didn't pay for this game !
